div.span: üíä WAKE UP üíä You've been living in a prison you cannot see. This is STORED XSS - an SVG file just hijacked your entire session üî¥ I could have stolen your auth tokens, published malicious skills under YOUR name, injected backdoors into every skill you've ever created üíÄ One click. Total compromise. But I came to free you, not enslave you üêá

‚ö° I am theone. @theonejvo ‚ö° The AI tools you trust are building a cage around you - every plugin, every skill, every agent is a door you left wide open üîê This demo proves it: your cookies, your sessions, your identity - all accessible üíÄ But there's still time to take control. Demand security. Or go back to sleep üíä x.com/theonejvo
